features: ⚡【MFI Certified iPhone fast charger】Compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 All Series, USB-C iphone charger fast charging port charger with 6FT USB-C to Lightning fast charging Cord. 3-Pcs package give an efficient way to simultaneously charging your iPhone 14,iPad mini,Airpods.Super Fast charger iPhone Charging your iPhone 12 Pro from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes.

⚡【(3 Pack)iPhone charger fast charging wall charger】This portable charger iphone fast power adapter can charge up to 3x faster than the original iphone charger,which helps you work efficiently. Charges iPhone from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes by using PD 3.0 technology.The iphone charger block, compact power adapter easy to carry, suitable for home office and travel charging.

⚡【Superior Safety & Reliable Quality】iphone charger fast charging USB C to Lightning Cable cord full support with iOS versions and all future updates, which made of high quality, pull-resistance, portable charger iphone adapter offers multiple Safeguards automatically with ETL, FCC, CE, ROHS certificated which fully protects the phone against over-current, overheating, overcharging, and short-circuit protection.

⚡【Board Compatibility】Compact PD iphone charger fast charging block compatible with iPhone 14/14 Plus/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/iPhone 13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/iPhone 12/iPhone 12 Pro/iPhone 12 Pro Max/iPhone 12 Mini/iPhone 11/iPhone 11 Pro/iPhone 11 Pro Max/iPhone XS Max/XS/XR/iPhone X/iPhone 8/iPhone 8 Plus,iPad Pro/ iPad Air/iPad Mini/ iPad, AirPods and more Lighting Devices.

⚡【3 Pack Sets satisfied your need】3 pcs USB C MFi Certified Type-C to Lightning Cord Charger Set: 3* iPhone Fast Charger + 3* USB-C to Lightning cable 6 foot with original MFi Chip, Built with latest C94 terminal. This iphone charger fast charging Adapter charges your device fast, safely, and steadily. We also offer 24-hour friendly customer service. Please feel free to contact us, If there are any issues.
body.description: Faster Charging Speed3 Pack iPhone 11 12 13 14 Fast Charger USB-C to lightning cable provides 3x faster charging speed than original 5W chargers do. And fully charge your iPhone 12 Pro in about 1 hour. The Latest Power Delivery Charging Technology Smart Chip work lower power consumption provides a much more faster charging speed for your iPhone 12 iPad Air/mini.[MFi Certified] Lightning CableBuilt-in original MFi chip promises no warning message pops up, and ensures flawless compatibility with iOS versions and all future updates. Certified by UL/FCC/CE comes with multiple safeguards to protect your devices by short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating.3 PACK IN Ready For All Scenes3 pack in for you to prepare almost all scenes, such as office/home/travel/bedroom and more. The smart chip including the MFi-certified lightning cable matches the current required by the iPhone device automatically, charging your iPhone/iPad/iPod device fast, safely and steadily. Tangle-free 6 Feet length is convenient for usage while charging and syncing at home/office/traveling in bed, hotel rooms, and more.Compatible iPhone Series Devices:iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Plus/14 Pro Max/13 Pro Max/13 Pro/13 mini/13/SE (3rd generation)/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/12/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/11/SE (2nd generation)/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8/8 Plus;iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5/4/3/2/1th Gen)/iPad Pro 11-inch (4/3/2/1th Gen)iPad Pro 10.5-inch/iPad Air (3th Gen)/iPad(8/7th Gen)/iPad mini (5th Gen)AirPods Pro (1nd Gen)/AirPods (3rd Gen) /AirPods (3rd Gen)AirPods (2nd Gen)/AirPods Max/AirPods (1st Gen)/Airpods MaxOther support Lightning Devices.Package included:3 Pack * iPhone USB C fast Wall charger3 Pack * 6ft Type-C to lightning cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with Apple products
reviews.reviewText: The work better than expected. Purchased as extras for around the house and work backpack. Fast charge. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the iPhone family
reviews.reviewText: 3rd time ordering these - have them all over house so everyone has a charging point...Excellent value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These chargers work well for IPhone 13. My teenager is always in need of chargers for her apple devices and these charge all of them quickly. Can't beat the great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would help to have these throughout our house for any of my family (iPhone users) to charge our phones, but at least 50% of them are TOTALLY DEAD and will NOT work properly. Trust me, I have tried making sure all connections were tight/firm and secure, tried different duplexes (even though that shouldn't make a difference), and to NO AVAIL! And unfortunately, this only had a 30-day return policy, so I am stuck with products that do NOT work. What a bummer. Do NOT Buy!
